review: Enjoying my new Fire TV Stick immensely. I am a granny and not particularly savvy when it comes to technology but it was so easy and simple to install. Love being totally wireless and my expanded viewing options.
author: Molly Kewl

review: Easy to install... easier to use.  There is a bit of a learning curve to navigate through the menu, but that's hardly an issue if used regularly.  Since I bought my Fire Stick, my Apple TV has not been turned on... Need I say more?  Until Apple and Amazon resolve the feud that limits access to each other's content, Fire Stick is the clear best choice - at less than half the price - and with full access to everything except iTunes (and how is that a problem?)
author: Bill Ama Griffiths

review: I highly recommend the Fire TV Stick .  It is affordable, easy to use and actually has more to offer than I expected.  Two thumbs up.
author: Rhett Burruss

review: I already have the Amazon Fire TV and love it so decided to purchase the Fire TV Stick for my bedroom. It has the same features and functionality as the Fire TV so I knew I wouldn't be disappointed. Great buy for the price and its much better than Roku and Chromcast.
